decks.notes: The focal point of the deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures while disrupting their game plan with removal spells. By utilizing cards like Winding Constrictor and Rishkar, Peema Renegade, the deck aims to build a strong board presence and get value from +1/+1 counters and mana ramp. The combination of creatures like Walking Ballista and Verdurous Gearhulk provide additional threats and ways to close out the game. This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on early aggression and tempo to secure victory against opponent.

The main concept of this Golgari Aggro deck is to utilize +1/+1 counters and energy generation synergies to overpower opponents quickly. This is achieved through cards like Winding Constrictor, Rishkar, Peema Renegade, and Verdurous Gearhulk to pump up creatures and create a formidable board presence. Additionally, the deck includes removal spells like Grasp of Darkness and Fatal Push to deal with threats, as well as card draw from Glint-Sleeve Siphoner. Overall, the deck aims to establish early aggression and snowball into a dominant position before the opponent can stabilize.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on generating powerful board presence and overwhelming the opponent with efficient creatures and removal spells. The key strategy is to combine cards that benefit from +1/+1 counters, such as Verdurous Gearhulk and Winding Constrictor, with cards that generate extra value from creatures entering the battlefield, like Rishkar, Peema Renegade and Catacomb Sifter. By utilizing the synergy between these cards, the deck aims to quickly build a threatening board state and push for early game dominance.

The main idea of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and efficient creature strategy. Utilizing cards like Nissa, Voice of Zendikar and Gideon, Ally of Zendikar to create tokens and pump up creatures, along with powerful threats like Verdurous Gearhulk and Heart of Kiran. Stasis Snare and Authority of the Consuls help control the board and slow down the opponent, while cards like Sylvan Advocate and Rishkar, Peema Renegade provide additional support and synergy. Overall, the deck aims to establish a strong board presence early on and maintain pressure throughout the game.

The deck revolves around the interaction between Saheeli Rai and Felidar Guardian, creating an infinite combo that allows you to copy the Guardian repeatedly, generating an army of 1/4 creatures with haste. To support this combo, the deck includes cards like Oath of Nissa and Attune with Aether to help find the combo pieces, as well as removal spells like Harnessed Lightning and Shock to control the board. The deck also includes value cards like Cloudblazer and Spell Queller to provide additional card advantage and disruption to opponents.

This deck focuses on setting up the Saheeli Rai and Felidar Guardian combo, allowing you to create infinite copies of the Felidar Guardian to blink permanent triggers. This combo can lock opponents out of the game by reusing powerful abilities like Planeswalker activations or ETB effects. The deck also includes cards to help find the combo pieces, protect them with countermagic, and provide additional value with cards like Chandra, Torch of Defiance and Nissa, Vital Force. It aims to quickly assemble the combo and win the game in a single explosive turn.

The main concept of this deck is to create a powerful combo using the cards Felidar Guardian and Saheeli Rai. By repeatedly using Saheeli Rai's -2 ability to create a token copy of Felidar Guardian, you can create an infinite loop that allows you to exile your own planeswalker and bring it back to the battlefield, triggering powerful abilities such as card draw or removal. The deck also includes control elements like Disallow and Negate to protect the combo and disrupt your opponent's strategy. This combo can quickly overwhelm your opponent and lead to a victory.

The main concept of this Mardu Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle. By utilizing a variety of low-cost creatures and vehicles, along with removal spells like Shock and Unlicensed Disintegration, this deck aims to quickly chip away at the opponent's life total and maintain board control. Additionally, the inclusion of Gideon, Ally of Zendikar provides a powerful threat that can help close out games quickly. The mana base is designed to ensure a smooth curve of threats and spells throughout the game.

This deck focuses on creating a powerful combo by using Saheeli Rai and Felidar Guardian to generate infinite tokens with haste. The key strategy involves efficiently using cards like Prophetic Prism and Oath of Nissa to dig for the combo pieces while controlling the board with removal spells like Shock and Harnessed Lightning. Ajani Unyielding provides additional card advantage and removal, while Authority of the Consuls can slow down aggressive opponents. The deck is designed to quickly assemble the combo and overwhelm the opponent with an army of token creatures.

The main focus of this deck is to establish early board presence and apply pressure to the opponent with aggressive creatures such as Scrapheap Scrounger and Toolcraft Exemplar. Spell Queller provides disruption while Gideon, Ally of Zendikar generates additional threats and pumps the team. The deck also utilizes counterspells like Metallic Rebuke to protect its threats and removal spells like Stasis Snare to deal with opposing threats. The mana base is designed to support the Esper color combination with a mix of dual lands and basic lands to ensure consistency in casting spells.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through counterspells, removal spells, and powerful creatures like Torrential Gearhulk. The key strategy is to establish board control with Dynavolt Tower and use card advantage from spells like Glimmer of Genius to outvalue the opponent. Jace, Unraveler of Secrets provides additional card draw and disruption, while cards like Disallow and Negate help to prevent opponent's threats from resolving. The mana base is designed to support the deck's need for both blue and red mana sources.

The deck focuses on creating an infinite combo using Felidar Guardian and Saheeli Rai to generate an infinite number of hasty 1/4 Felidar Guardian tokens that can attack for the win. The deck includes counterspells, removal, card draw, and board wipes to control the game until the combo can be assembled. Nahiri, the Harbinger is included as a versatile threat and tool to find combo pieces. The mana base is designed to support the deck's colors and provide consistency in casting spells.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful removal spells. By playing a combination of efficient threats like Scrapheap Scrounger and Archangel Avacyn, along with disruption from cards like Thalia, Heretic Cathar and Anguished Unmaking, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and control the board. The Planeswalker duo of Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Liliana, the Last Hope provide additional versatility and power. With a balanced mix of creatures, removal, and disruption, this deck aims to quickly close out games against its opponents.

The deck focuses on quickly establishing a board presence with efficient creatures and planeswalkers, utilizing cards like Thraben Inspector and Gideon, Ally of Zendikar. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures like Lambholt Pacifist and Verdurous Gearhulk, supported by removal spells like Stasis Snare. The deck also aims to take advantage of powerful planeswalkers like Nissa, Voice of Zendikar to create tokens and pump creatures. Overall, the deck aims to be proactive and put pressure on the opponent early in the game to secure a quick victory.

The main focus of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to quickly deploy threats onto the battlefield and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creature and planeswalker strategies. The deck aims to establish a strong board presence with cards like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Verdurous Gearhulk, while using removal spells like Stasis Snare to control the board. By combining efficient creatures with powerful planeswalkers and staying on the offensive, the deck seeks to put pressure on the opponent and secure a victory through a combination of damage and board dominance.

The main idea of this deck is to control the game by removing threats and countering spells with cards like Disallow, Negate, and Murder. It also aims to generate card advantage through Glimmer of Genius and Torrential Gearhulk. The deck includes some lifegain options with Essence Extraction and Kalitas, Traitor of Ghet, to help stabilize against aggressive decks. The land base is focused on enabling the deck's color requirements to consistently cast its spells. Ultimately, the goal is to out-value the opponent and win the game through attrition and control.
